TextLibrary.Text: Lad, it's hapennin' again. There's another piece o' the machine right near Silvermyr. They say a centaur has it all locked up in a cave in Alfland, but I canna imagine a Centaur knowin' how to hide somethin' from a Dwarf, eh? I mean just ye think about...

Lad, it's hapennin' again. There's another piece o' the machine right near Silvermyr. They say a centaur has it all locked up in a cave in Alfland, but I canna imagine a Centaur knowin' how to hide somethin' from a Dwarf, eh? I mean just ye think about...

Lass, it's hapennin' again. There's another piece o' the machine right near Silvermyr. They say a centaur has it all locked up in a cave in Alfland, but I canna imagine a Centaur knowin' how to hide somethin' from a Dwarf, eh? I mean just ye think about...

Lass, it's hapennin' again. There's another piece o' the machine right near Silvermyr. They say a centaur has it all locked up in a cave in Alfland, but I canna imagine a Centaur knowin' how to hide somethin' from a Dwarf, eh? I mean just ye think about...
Actually, Khalkus, I'm curious about what this Great Machine does. Let's investigate.
